title: SERVICE LIFE
fullText:
total period of useful life of a cell or a battery in operation
Note 1 to entry: For primary batteries, service life relates to the total discharge time or capacity under specific conditions.
Note 2 to entry: For secondary cells and batteries, the service life may be expressed in time, number of charge/discharge cycles, or capacity in ampere hours (Ah).
[SOURCE: IEV 482-03-46]
